children.description: Content of the copy button (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the copy button

entryDelay.description: Entry delay on the copy button tooltip

exitDelay.description: Exit delay on the copy button tooltip

hasNoPadding.description: Removes padding from clipboard copy button. This is used for inline-compact variant

maxWidth.description: Max width of the copy button tooltip

onClick.description: Callback for the copy when the button is clicked (Function: (event: React.MouseEvent) => void)

onTooltipHidden.description: Callback when tooltip's hide transition has finished executing (Function: () => void)

position.description:
Position of the copy button tooltip (Type: | TooltipPosition
| 'auto'
| 'top'
| 'bottom'
| 'left'
| 'right'
| 'top-start'
| 'top-end'
| 'bottom-start'
| 'bottom-end'
| 'left-start'
| 'left-end'
| 'right-start'
| 'right-end')

textId.description: ID of the content that is being copied
